Hi, I'm Jordan! Currently, I am a Master of Environmental Data Science (MEDS) student at the Bren School of Environmental Science & Management. During my time here at Bren, I aim to harness my analytical prowess in data science to drive impactful contributions to scientific research and sustainable solutions for marine coastal ecosystems.
